fr.lip6.kernel.adaptative
Class ThreadedProductKernel<T>

java.lang.Object
  fr.lip6.kernel.Kernel<T>
      fr.lip6.kernel.adaptative.ThreadedProductKernel<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ThreadedProductKernel<T>
extends Kernel<T>

Major kernel computed as a weighted product of minor kernels : K = k_i^{w_i}
Computation of the kernel matrix is done by running a thread on sub matrices. The number of threads is chosen as function of the number of available cpus.

Author:
dpicard
See Also:
Serialized Form
